TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWithSubnet

Docs.summary: The stage of the virtual network definition allowing to add subnets.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.Subnet.Definition.IBlank`1<class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.Network.Definition.IWithCreateAndSubnet> DefineSubnet(string name) cil managed

Docs.summary: Begins the definition of a new subnet to add to the virtual network. The definition must be completed with a call to Subnet.DefinitionStages.WithAttach.attach().
Docs.return: The first stage of the new subnet definition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.Network.Definition.IWithCreateAndSubnet WithSubnet(string name, string cidr) cil managed

Docs.param: The name to assign to the subnet.
The address space of the subnet, within the address space of the network, using the CIDR notation.
Docs.summary: Explicitly adds a subnet to the virtual network. If no subnets are explicitly specified, a default subnet called "subnet1" covering the entire first address space will be created. Note this method's effect is additive, i.e. each time it is used, a new subnet is added to the network.
Docs.return: The next stage of the virtual network definition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.Network.Definition.IWithCreateAndSubnet WithSubnets(class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, string> nameCidrPairs) cil managed

Docs.param: A Map of CIDR addresses for the subnets, indexed by the name of each subnet to be defined.
Docs.summary: Explicitly defines subnets in the virtual network based on the provided map.
Docs.return: The next stage of the virtual network definition.
